name: Stella Rising
description:
Here be a grid-based RPG where you try to reach the top of a mountain within 600 turns.

This is a solo project made to prove that I can, in fact, complete a game. It might not look that pretty, but hopefully it's interesting enough that you'll have some fun playing this.

I'll be putting this game and all future games with 'Stella' in the title into the public domain or Creative Commons Zero (CC0).

Warning: There might be bugs and glitches. Also this game hasn't been play-tested by others so the difficulty might be weird.

The game is complete, but I might make some quality of life updates later on.

---STORY---

Vesper is on her way to deliver something to her aunt. But Aunt Stella has holed herself up at the summit of Mt. Astra, and she's gotten some strong folks to keep her niece away!

Vesper (a complete amateur) is seriously out of her league here, so she'll have to learn how to get good if she wants to make it past all the adversaries blocking her way!
